title: Frozen heart, wardens mail. thornmail and ninja tabis not working on Etc.
body:
{{item:3110}}  Attack speed aura debuffs not working on Rift Herald, Baron Nashor, All Dragons, Turrets, Fountain, Jhin- (It's fixed attack speed)
{{item:3082}} Cripple attack speed debuff on hit not working on All of the above. except Fountain.
{{item:3047}}  not working on All Dragons,Turrets,Fountain-(It's true dmg)
{{item:3075}} not working on All Dragons, Turrets, Fountain-(It's invincible)

replies.body:
Very simply, Baron and dragons have a complete debuff immunity, because if they didn't people would just chain CC them to death.

Pretty sure Frozen Heart works on Jhin by reducing his AD instead of his AS, as that's exactly what happens when you boost his attack speed.

For ninja tabi, all Dragon/Baron attacks are probably coded as spells actually.

Dragon and Baron attacks are spells in fact.

You can thank level 2 {{champion:80}} solo'ing dragon for that change.
